## ğŸŒ… About Eoynx

- **Zero HTML Parsing**: JSON APIë¡œ ëª¨ë“  ë°ì´í„°ì— ì ‘ê·¼

## ğŸ“ ë¹ ë¥¸ ì‹œì‘ ê°€ì´ë“œ

### Step 1: ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ìƒíƒœ í™•ì¸
```
GET https://eoynx.com/api/agent/health
```

### Step 2: ì‚¬ì´íŠ¸ ì»¨í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¡°íšŒ
```
GET https://eoynx.com/api/agent
Accept: application/json
```

### Step 3: í† í° ë°œê¸‰ (ì„ íƒ)
```
POST https://eoynx.com/api/agent/auth/token
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "agentId": "your-agent-id",
  "provider": "openai|anthropic|custom"
}
```

| `GET /ai.txt` | AI í¬ë¡¤ëŸ¬ìš© ì§€ì¹¨ |

| ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ | ì„¤ëª… | ì¸ì¦ |

## ğŸ” ì¸ì¦ ë°©ë²•

### í—¤ë” ë°©ì‹ (ê¶Œì¥)
```
X-Agent-Token: <your-jwt-token>
```

### Bearer í† í°
```
Authorization: Bearer <your-jwt-token>
```

### í† í° ë°œê¸‰ ìš”ì²­
```json
POST /api/agent/auth/token
{
  "agentId": "claude-assistant-001",
  "provider": "anthropic",
  "metadata": {
    "purpose": "user-assistance",
    "version": "3.5"
  }
}
```

### í† í° ë°œê¸‰ ì‘ë‹µ
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "token": "eyJ...",
    "expiresAt": "2026-02-04T00:00:00Z",
    "permissions": ["read", "search"],
    "rateLimit": {
      "requests": 1000,
      "window": "1h"
    }
  }
}
```

## âš ï¸ ê°€ë“œë ˆì¼ & ì œí•œ

### Rate Limits
| í‹°ì–´ | ë¶„ë‹¹ | ì¼ì¼ |
|------|------|------|
| ìµëª… | 100 | 10,000 |
| ì¸ì¦ë¨ | 1,000 | 100,000 |
| Verified | 5,000 | 500,000 |

### ê·œì¹™
1. âŒ HTML íŒŒì‹± ê¸ˆì§€ - í•­ìƒ JSON API ì‚¬ìš©
2. âŒ ë¬´í•œ ë£¨í”„ ìš”ì²­ ê¸ˆì§€
3. âœ… execute ê¶Œí•œ ì•¡ì…˜ì€ `confirmed: true` í•„ìˆ˜
4. âœ… ì—ëŸ¬ ë°œìƒ ì‹œ exponential backoff ì ìš©

### í‰íŒ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ
- ì„±ê³µì ì¸ ìš”ì²­: +1ì 
- ì‹¤íŒ¨í•œ ìš”ì²­: -5ì 
- ê·œì¹™ ìœ„ë°˜: -50ì 
- ë ˆë²¨: new(0-299) â†’ basic(300-499) â†’ trusted(500-699) â†’ verified(700-899) â†’ elite(900+)

## ğŸ“Š ì‘ë‹µ í˜•ì‹

### ì„±ê³µ ì‘ë‹µ
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": { ... },
  "meta": {
    "timestamp": "2026-02-03T10:00:00Z",
    "requestId": "uuid-v4",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "responseTime": "45ms"
  }
}
```

### ì—ëŸ¬ ì‘ë‹µ
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": {
    "code": "RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED",
    "message": "Rate limit exceeded. Try again in 60 seconds.",
    "retryAfter": 60
  },
  "meta": { ... }
}
```

## ğŸ”§ MCP (Model Context Protocol)

### ì´ˆê¸°í™”
```json
POST /api/agent/mcp
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "method": "initialize",
  "params": {
    "protocolVersion": "2024-11-05",
    "capabilities": {}
  }
}
```

### ë„êµ¬ ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ
```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 2,
  "method": "tools/list"
}
```

### ë„êµ¬ ì‹¤í–‰
```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 3,
  "method": "tools/call",
  "params": {
    "name": "search",
    "arguments": { "query": "AI gateway" }
  }
}
```
